function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inability to make causal inferences due to the correlational nature of the study may limit the ability to identify direct causes of covid-19 mortality rates.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Study documents how chronic disease and covid-19 are related to the built and natural environment, potentially indicating environmental factors that contribute to disease spread.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Authors express caution in drawing conclusions based on fixed parameter methods and highly aggregate spatial data, highlighting the potential for inaccurate conclusions.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Authors express discomfort with using early, evolving covid-19 data at the county level, delaying the study’s publication multiple times to wait for more reliable data.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Linking built environment and natural environment with chronic and infectious disease covid-19 pandemics","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obesity mediating the relationship between the built and natural environment and covid-19 mortality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High reliance on private vehicles and low support for public transit","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compact transit-oriented development","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Densification of communities leading to higher population density","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obesity and old age correlated with greater covid-19 mortality risk","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased obesity rates in the united states and globally","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of active travel supportive infrastructure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate results and inferences due to unobserved heterogeneity","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent impact of obesity and built environment on covid-19 mortality in different countries","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of construction material supply","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Job loss due to pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced mobility causing industries to shut down","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting exploratory interviews with construction experts without proper protective measures may lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using questionnaire surveys without proper safeguards can result in the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data analysis involving physical interaction and close collaboration may pose a risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using random sampling technique for data collection","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Workers and technical engineers working with full consciousness and scrutiny","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Off-site workers and project participants required to maintain constant communication and coordination","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modification of construction management to accommodate sudden crises","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of projects due to contagious virus","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Time overrun due to pandemic control period","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial impact due to economic deterioration and project suspensions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious virus in construction sites","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fluctuation of material price and shortage of materials and supply chains","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of workers in urgent medical facility projects","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and conspiracy theories about the pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misconception that climate change is a distant threat and less urgent than immediate crises.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Underemphasis of the impacts of climate change on public health in public debates.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term acceptance of lockdown measures due to temporary nature","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perception of climate change as a crisis with temporary solutions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global nature of climate change and covid-19 pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in national responses to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of pandemic measures for climate change response","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Long-term exposure to raised indoor temperature and humidity can result in severe sick building syndrome sbs symptoms.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor air pollutants causing annual loss of disability-adjusted life years dalys and economic losses.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Traditional ieq monitoring protocol involving high-cost, invasive environmental sensors with limited spatial dimension and data storage.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deficient traditional ieq measurement tools","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of ieq information interaction with occupants","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of synchronization between objective and subjective data in ieq studies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Continuous improvement and upgrading of the intelligent built environment monitor ibem since 2014","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases transmission through shared mobile interface and web platform","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality monitoring","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integration between objective and subjective ieq data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of only five sensors may limit the comprehensive monitoring of environmental parameters and miss potential risks to human health.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
